mapper.sql: id, consumer_id, doctor_id, from_id, to_id, message,status, gmt_create, gmt_modified
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from t_chat_message
order by ${orderByClause}

SELECT t_chat_message.id,t_chat_message.consumer_id,t_chat_message.doctor_id,t_chat_message.from_id, t_chat_message.to_id,t_chat_message.message,t_chat_message.gmt_create,t_chat_message.gmt_modified, t_consumer.name AS c_name,t_consumer.address AS c_name,t_consumer.img AS c_img,t_doctor.address AS d_address, t_doctor.img AS d_img,t_doctor.name AS d_name,t_chat_message.status FROM t_chat_message RIGHT JOIN t_doctor ON t_doctor.id = t_chat_message.doctor_id LEFT JOIN t_consumer ON t_chat_message.consumer_id = t_consumer.id WHERE t_consumer.id = #{consumerId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND t_doctor.id = #{doctorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT t_chat_message.id,t_chat_message.consumer_id,t_chat_message.doctor_id,t_chat_message.from_id, t_chat_message.to_id,t_chat_message.message,t_chat_message.gmt_create,t_chat_message.gmt_modified, t_consumer.name AS c_name,t_consumer.address AS c_name,t_consumer.img AS c_img,t_doctor.address AS d_address, t_doctor.img AS d_img,t_doctor.name AS d_name,t_chat_message.status FROM t_chat_message RIGHT JOIN t_doctor ON t_doctor.id = t_chat_message.doctor_id LEFT JOIN t_consumer ON t_chat_message.consumer_id = t_consumer.id WHERE t_consumer.id = #{consumerId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND t_doctor.id = #{doctorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT t_chat_message.id,t_chat_message.consumer_id,t_chat_message.doctor_id,t_chat_message.from_id, t_chat_message.to_id,t_chat_message.message,t_chat_message.gmt_create,t_chat_message.gmt_modified, t_consumer.name AS c_name,t_consumer.address AS c_name,t_consumer.img AS c_img,t_doctor.address AS d_address, t_doctor.img AS d_img,t_doctor.name AS d_name,t_chat_message.status FROM t_chat_message RIGHT JOIN t_doctor ON t_doctor.id = t_chat_message.doctor_id LEFT JOIN t_consumer ON t_chat_message.consumer_id = t_consumer.id WHERE t_consumer.id = #{consumerId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND t_doctor.id = #{doctorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT t_chat_message.id,t_chat_message.consumer_id,t_chat_message.doctor_id,t_chat_message.from_id, t_chat_message.to_id,t_chat_message.message,t_chat_message.gmt_create,t_chat_message.gmt_modified, t_consumer.name AS c_name,t_consumer.address AS c_name,t_consumer.img AS c_img,t_doctor.address AS d_address, t_doctor.img AS d_img,t_doctor.name AS d_name,t_chat_message.status FROM t_chat_message RIGHT JOIN t_doctor ON t_doctor.id = t_chat_message.doctor_id LEFT JOIN t_consumer ON t_chat_message.consumer_id = t_consumer.id WHERE t_chat_message.status = 0 AND t_doctor.id = #{doctorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into t_chat_message (id, consumer_id, doctor_id, from_id, to_id, message, status, gmt_create, gmt_modified) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{consumerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{doctorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{fromId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{toId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{message,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
